text: Magar onhoe, ki ʙo hampajmononi sumo pajmon ʙastaand jo onhoe, ki nazdaton meojand va az cang ʙo sumo jo qavmi xud ʙa tang omadaand. Va agar Alloh taolo mexost, ononro ʙar sumo musallat mekard, ki ʙo sumo ʙicangand, pas, agar az sumo kanoragiri kardand va ʙo sumo nacangidand va taslim [-u farmonʙardor]-i sumo sudand, [ʙidoned, ki digar] Alloh taolo ʙaroi sumo rohe [ʙaroi tacovuz] ʙar onon qaror nadodaast
